scripts.build: npm run build:debug && npm run build:release && npm run make-index
scripts.build:debug: emcmake cmake -G Ninja -B build -S . -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug && emmake ninja -C build
scripts.build:release: emcmake cmake -G Ninja -B build -S . -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release && emmake ninja -C build
scripts.make-index: node -e "require('shelljs/global'); const p = exec('npm prefix', {silent: true}).stdout.trim(); const s = `node ${p}/node_modules/@zenfs/core/scripts/make-index.js`; exec(`${s} -o dist/index-release.json dist/release`); exec(`${s} -o dist/index-debug.json dist/debug`);
